solution.text:
\(\frac {-_{k}_^5}{_{k}_^3} = {-_{k}_}^5 \times _{k}_^{-3}
Now, \(-_{k}_^5 = -1 \times _{k}_^5 \qquad [Since the result of raising a negative number to an odd power is negative]\)
\(\Rightarrow -1 \times _{k}_^5 \times _{k}_^{-3} = -1 \times _{k}_^{5-3} = -1 \times_{k}_^2 = -_{{k**2}}_\)
